sum.title: Sum
sum.description: Sum of all line item sums

discount.title: Discount
discount.description: Sum of all document level discounts

charge.title: Charge
charge.description: Sum of all document level charges

tax_included.title: Tax Included
tax_included.description: If prices include tax, this is the total tax included in the price.

total.title: Total
total.description: Sum of all line sums minus the discounts, plus the charges, without tax.

taxes.title: Tax Totals
taxes.description: Summary of all the taxes included in the invoice.

tax.title: Tax
tax.description: Total amount of tax to apply to the invoice.

total_with_tax.title: Total with Tax
total_with_tax.description: Grand total after all taxes have been applied.

retained_tax.title: Retained Tax
retained_tax.description: Total tax retained or withheld to be paid to the tax authority by the customer or buyer.

rounding.title: Rounding
rounding.description:
Rounding amount to apply to the invoice totals so that totals match expected
values or for local currency rounding rules.

payable.title: Payable
payable.description: Total amount to be paid after applying taxes and rounding adjustments.

advance.title: Advance
advance.description: Total amount already paid in advance.

due.title: Due
due.description: How much actually needs to be paid now.

Totals.description: Totals contains the summaries of all calculations for the invoice.
